name: Seven-League Suit
description:
A hardsuit featuring the experimental “Seven-Leagues” Boosters has the unfortunate tendency to either shred the muscles of unprepared pilots or just subject them to unacceptable levels of G-Force without proper padding. Either way you gotta pay the Fast Tax. 
You may jump at normal speed and you may, when you move or dash, take 1 pilot damage for +3 Speed on that action.
